Name: Crucis Lancers
Details: The Crucis Lancers are a multi-regimental brigade of the Armed Forces of the Federated Suns, with a renowed history that dates back to the First Succession War when they were formed out of former SLDF units that chose to serve House Davion after the dissolution of the Star League. Considered one of the prime units of the AFFS, the Crucis Lancers consist of eight regiments, all deployed throughout Davion space.
